document.full_text: azerbaijan's defense ministry was quoted saturday as saying azeri troops would eventually be sent to seize back the armenian-backed breakaway territory of nagorno-karabakh.
document.title: azeri defense ministry says armenia making war inevitable
lines_and_colors: azerbaijan's defense ministry was quoted saturday as saying azeri troops would eventually be sent to seize back the armenian-backed breakaway territory of nagorno-karabakh.
